scripts.k8s: kubectl apply -f kubernetes/secret.yaml && kubectl apply -f kubernetes/deployment.yaml && kubectl apply -f kubernetes/service.yaml && kubectl apply -f kubernetes/configmap.yaml && kubectl apply -f kubernetes/persistentvolumeclaim.yaml && kubectl apply -f kubernetes/persistentvolumes.yaml && kubectl apply -f kubernetes/prometheus-rbac.yaml && kubectl apply -f kubernetes/network-policy.yaml && kubectl apply -f kubernetes/ingress.yaml && kubectl apply -f kubernetes/ingress-nginx-deployment.yaml && kubectl apply -f kubernetes/HPA.yml && kubectl apply -f kubernetes/cronjobs.yaml
scripts.k8s-delete: kubectl delete networkpolicies --all && kubectl delete deployments --all && kubectl delete services --all
